#summary XXX(...)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, see [findByKey findByKey()] and [findOne findOne()] for more info. Replace `XXX` with the name of an association you have set up through [hasOne hasOne()] or [belongsTo belongsTo()].

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- a "belongsTo" association from "comment" to "post" is required --->
<cfset aComment = model("comment").findByKey(params.commentId)>

<cfset aPost = aComment.post()>
=
<cfset aPost = model("post").findByKey(aComment.postId)>
}}}

{{{
<!--- a "hasOne" association from "user" to "profile" is required --->
<cfset aUser = model("user").findByKey(params.userId)>

<cfset aProfile = aUser.profile()>
=
<cfset aProfile = model("profile").findOne(where="userId=#aUser.id#")>
}}}
